## select() function

Programmatically select the text of a HTML element

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function select(element: HTMLElement): any;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type        | Description                               |
| --------- | ----------- | ----------------------------------------- |
| element   | HTMLElement | The element whose text you wish to select |

**Returns:**

any
